analysis.key_quote: Stripping policy-influencing positions of due process protections—as this rule proposes—would not improve performance. It would inject political instability into roles that require deep technical skill, institutional knowledge, and impartial judgment.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about the undermining of civil service integrity, due process protections, and the risks of politicization, which align with the themes of merit-based systems and employee rights.
